508b44c2-a4d5-5b6a-8064-f431605ab32e.title: Acceptance criteria - Has a pre-pour inspection been completed with the client, and they have verified in writing that the pour is able to commence?

ca558a49-2270-58c0-a08d-98204cced2cc.title: Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) - Pre-Pour Checklist

ae86cf42-f983-5714-ab6c-42571514a449.title: ○ The foundation location, depth and dimensions shall also be checked and confirmed prior. to placing the blinding.

01eabe0a-10f8-5400-9041-d074788419d5.title: ○ The foundation base excavation shall be tested, surface compacted and approved prior to placement of the blinding.

ec7ee693-13c8-5626-ab42-5d7cca6da121.title: Ref docs - IFC drawings, Pre Blinding inspection

d18e565f-315f-5077-a941-29d82d8c1e6f.title: ○ Bearing Capacity report (if not on piles)

4de94789-0a5f-514d-b31d-d228bee0d2aa.title: ○ Approval shall be provided, in writing, by McDermott to the foundation. subcontractor before commencing with concrete placement.
